description:
Enjoy the most thrilling Grand city bank robbery police rescue mission in this extreme car driver simulator. Robbers Professional robbers have planned a new robbery heist. The best police chase game is here. Experience new heist and advanced driving controls. Play this newest Grand Theft game and plot your runaway from aggressive cops. Try to be quick, the robbers are clever, they have a Bank Robbery Gang Escape Police Car Chasing record of stealing money from banks in millions of dollars, this Bank Robbery Gang Escape Police Car Chasing is an addictive racing game that gives you the best 3D simulation for free. Enjoy this endless police car chase of robbery, the robber’s gang is quick, they know the short cuts in city streets, they will not travel from highways but they can cut-paths to drive through that police hardly knows, stay safe, drive the car, get thieves, snatch the money they have stolen.
Robbery job here is very challenging. Robber will drive car to the city bank. For the time limit robbers can disable cameras and security alarms. If security alarms are not turn off, robber will get arrest. Thief will rob money on gun point from the people and cashier. Stay siren alert during this Bank Theft crime. Rush in your car and getaway from the police arrest. In Bank Robbery Gang Escape Police Car Chasing Cops will keep on chasing you. Only speeding the drive can save you from getting arrest. Your driving skills can help you to rush towards safe destination. Drive car to the marked destination and get away from chasing cops. Finally robber will manage to successfully escape from chasing police and Mission Complete!

You have entered a busy bank, in the middle of the city to rob, as more people visit there, it would be filled with more stuff like money and jewellery. Bank Robbery Gang Escape Police Car Chasing is filled with realistic thrills and series of robbery acts by you with well planned escapes and a good adventure loot, rob the wealthy and spread among the poor, this game is about your will how you take to play it.

Showing down some of the important features of this game:
• Realistic Controls
• Addictive gameplay
• Real men car racing and chase adventure
• Cop vs robbers racing
• Upgrade your cars by going higher in the multilevel game
• Multiple levels
• High quality graphics of simulation game
• Shooting guns with multiple shooting environment
• Realistic sound effects and background music
• FREE to install

Download Bank Robbery Gang Escape Police Car Chasing and have fun playing this amazing game, share it with your friends and check who gets more money from robbing this bank you have entered into. If you like our game, don’t forget to comment and rate our app.
Have a good day and good holiday playing Bank Robbery Gang Escape Police Car Chasing.
